website_summaries.verdict: You will notice an improvement in your game with this large, comfortable golf grip.
pros: The Super Stroke grip is available in a variety of colors and designs
The firm grip feels well made and durable
The grip has a decent amount of tack
There is a noticeable reduction in wrist roll compared to other putter grips
cons: The extra-large size may take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Super stroke 3.0 is great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. It really does take your "hands out of the putt". It was really easy to put on. You will need solvent and double sided grip tape. I didn't use my vice with this grip. I recommend using a vice if you're new to regripping though. Makes it easier for the newbie. If you're on the fence about getting a super stroke, try it. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: damon ward

customer_reviews.title: Great grip but wish front panel were flatter
customer_reviews.text: Put one on my Zebra to replace the original 30 year old grip and after 2-3 rounds to get used to it my putting is better, especially on the 4-8 footers. Definitely helps take the hands out of the stroke. Obviously they work since you see gazillions of them on the Tour. Only wish was that the front panel was a little flatter where your thumbs rest so as to more positively align the putter face. This may only be a problem for me, however, as after using the Zebra grip for 30 years it may take a bit longer to adapt.
customer_reviews.author: Texas 777

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, size makes it great for control!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grip for my wife as she has trouble controlling her putter. She has carpal tunnel, so it’s difficult for her to keep the face of the club perpendicular to the target line. Used lighter fluid as a solvent on my grip tape and this grip slid right over it without any issue. About an hour later it was ready to use on our indoor putting mat. My wife loves it, she says it’s much more comfortable than her old grip and the larger size gives her more control.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Best Putter Investment
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! As described. Great product! I actually felt like I was putting better with this SuperStroke. Only complaint, provide grip tape and spray for regripping A single club. Had to buy gripping tape for all clubs because no one sell grip tape for a single club.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to push on
customer_reviews.text: I swore I would never grip my own putter again but the price was to good to resist. But from now on I will leave putters to professionals broke my vice wedge doing this one
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great grip and got it quick for overseas shipping. Expected delivery was Jun 9th and I got it today May 23rd from Seldom Sellers on an overseas shipping. I leave tomorrow for a 6 day golf trip and have my new grip on the putter now. Had a Super Stroke 2.0 and my putting improved. Hope for even more results with the Super stroke 3.0. It feels great in the hand
customer_reviews.author: robert l sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Significant putting improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big believer in fat grips. In my view, I feel like they minimize extraneous wrist and hand movement. I had one on my old putter. I went a year without one on my new putter. It's was OK but after this grip was installed a few weeks ago, my putting significantly improved.
customer_reviews.author: Carl MK9

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved being able to find this color combo. The 3.0 is the perfect size. The 5.0 Flatso was just a little too big. I upgraded from a pistol grip to this. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft Feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the grip. Nice and soft and allows your hands to relax, however it is almost too big and the 3.0 is smaller than the 2.0
customer_reviews.author: CRogers

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision in a While :)
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what took me so long to upgrade my Taylormade Ghost putter grip to the Super Stroke Legacy 3.0 !! It feels great in my L/XL non-cadet hands, and I have a ton of confidence over puts now. I feel like I have significantly greater control on my backswing and follow-through. Great tack, excellent look and feel. My very first 18 holes with this putter I only had 30 puts. BOOM
customer_reviews.author: Eric Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grip!!
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel. Almost tacky. Just what I needed to take my hands out of the putting action.
customer_reviews.author: gregory r ball

customer_reviews.title: Not going to say my game got better but my stroke sure did (not going to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps with putting. Not going to say my game got better but my stroke sure did (not going to make up for my poor aim). Great price and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: If you never have used a fat grip you should ...
customer_reviews.text: If you never have used a fat grip you should. I am 65, played all my life. Single digit HDCP, Once you use a fat grip you will not go back

customer_reviews.title: Shortened the club and added the SuperStroke grip and have really enjoyed putting with it
customer_reviews.text: Talked myself into re-gripping when a friend pointed out I was putting with the toe way up off the ground. Shortened the club and added the SuperStroke grip and have really enjoyed putting with it.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: This grip is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and was exactly as described. Installation was a breeze. It goes on like any other grip. Size-wise,(thickness), the 3.0 is perfect. It keeps my hands/wrists totally quiet, allowing for a straight back and through stroke. I honestly don't think I three-putted since installing it and I'm able to put all my long putts into that "three foot circle". I'm also draining some of those long putts. The ball seems to track straight as a laser. FWIW, I installed it on an original Odyssey 2 Ball putter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits in bag in putter slot not to big not to small
customer_reviews.author: Ron R.

product_meta.title: SuperStroke Slim 3.0 Putter Grip, Oversized, Lightweight Golf Grip, Non-slip, 10.50"L X 1.30"W, USGA Approved
product_meta.description: SuperStroke Legacy 3.0 Putter Grip The SuperStroke Legacy 3.0 Putter Grip features a Tour-driven size, measuring 1.3" in diameter. Weighing 60-grams, the Legacy 3.0 comes with SuperStroke-patented Parallel and CrossTraction technologies used to relax grip pressure and increase consistency for all playing levels. The 2015 Legacy 3.0 comes with an all-new graphics package and some fresh new colors.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR GRIP - The Super Stroke Slim 3.0 Putter Grip is 1.30" in Diameter and is Made of a Tacky Polyurethane Outer Layer
NO TAPER - Exclusive Super Stroke Technology Used in the Super Stroke Slim 3.0 Putter Grip for a More Consistent Stroke During Rounds of Golf
NON-SLIP GRIP - The CROSS-TRACTION Surface Texture Prevents the Super Stroke Slim 3.0 Putter Grip User's Hands From Slipping During Increment Weather Conditions
LIGHTWEIGHT GRIP - The Super Stroke Slim Putter Grip Is Made of EVA Foam Which Gives Your Putter A Lightweight Grip for A Maximum Feel
TOUR PROVEN - The Super Stroke Slim Series is One of the Most Popular Putter Grips Used on the PGA Tour by the Top Golfers in the World

specifications.Manufacturer: The Golf Shop of Wake Forest
